com.linecorp.armeria.common

Class Scheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.common.Scheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Scheme>

    public final class Scheme
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Scheme>
    A pair of SerializationFormat and SessionProtocol.

    A Scheme is represented and used as the scheme of a URI in the following format: 

    
 SerializationFormat.uriText() + '+' + SessionProtocol.uriText()

    For example:

    • "tbinary+https" - SerializationFormat.THRIFT_BINARY and SessionProtocol.HTTPS
    • "tcompact+h2c" - SerializationFormat.THRIFT_COMPACT and SessionProtocol.H2C

    • Method Detail

      • tryParse

        public static java.util.Optional<Scheme> tryParse(java.lang.String scheme)
        Parses the specified String into a Scheme. This method will return the same Scheme instance for equal values of scheme.
        Returns:
        Optional.empty() if the specified String could not be parsed or there is no such Scheme available

      • parse

        public static Scheme parse(java.lang.String scheme)
        Parses the specified String into a Scheme. This method will return the same Scheme instance for equal values of scheme.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified String could not be parsed or there is no such Scheme available

      • of

        public static Scheme of(SerializationFormat serializationFormat,
                        SessionProtocol sessionProtocol)
        Returns the Scheme of the specified SerializationFormat and SessionProtocol. This method returns the same Scheme instance for the same combination of SerializationFormat and SessionProtocol.

        Returns the SerializationFormat.
